author: Daniel Greene
description:
Brandon Sanderson finally gives an update on Mistborn Era 3 — and it’s something he’s waited 20 years to write. Meanwhile, I share why I don’t think Winds of Winter is ever happening.

Also this week:

LOTR: Hunt for Gollum movie news

A new book from Matt Dinniman

Penguin Random House’s big Disney manga deal

Warhammer’s Black Library reveals

Final Outlander book title

Crunchyroll controversy, BookTok convention disaster, and more
